title: Payment details - $t(app:serviceName)
heading: Has the claimant provided payment details?

detailsPresent.legend: Has the claimant provided payment details?

errors.presence: Select whether the claimant has provided payment details.
Select if it is a bank account or building society account.

errors.format: Enter a name on account without {{-invalid}}.
Enter a sort code - for example, ‘12 34 56’, ‘123456’ or ‘12-34-56’.
errors.modulus: Check the sort code - the one entered does not match the account number.

errors.format: Enter an account number - for example, ‘12345678’.
errors.modulus: Check the account number - the one entered does not match the sort code.
